1. Donald Trump tried to sway the Fed on when they should cut rates—Jerome Powell just threw down the gauntlet  Fortune
  2. Trump Promises Lower Interest Rates, but the President Doesn’t Control Those  The New York Times
  3. Donald Trump is on a collision course with an old foe  Sydney Morning Herald
  4. The Fed’s dilemma on Trump  Financial Times
  5. Grant Cardone: Interest Rates Would Finally Drop If Trump Is Elected  Yahoo Finance UK
